Activity: Final meeting with the team for launch day preparations.
Conduct a pre-launch checklist to ensure everything is in order for the launch.
Confirm that all team members are aligned on launch plans and responsibilities.
Launch the game; monitor and fix any immediate post-launch bugs or issues.
